variable.name: param
variable.expression: groovyScript("if(\"${_1}\".length() == 2) {return '';} else {def result=''; def params=\"${_1}\".replaceAll('[\\\\[|\\\\]|\\\\s]', '').split(',').toList();for(i = 0; i < params.size(); i++) {if(i==0){result+='* @param ' + params[i] + ' '}else{result+='\\n' + ' * @param ' + params[i] + ' '}}; return result;}", methodParameters());
